description:
Take the cold in your stride while you’re in this Vertex half zip. Whether you’re snowshoeing the local trails or taking in the views from a mountain peak, you’ll be toasty warm to handle whatever comes your way.

  • 100% Merino wool regulates your body temperature and resists odors to keep you focused on pushing hard
  • A half zip is there to help get rid of extra warmth and for lounging around the cabin
  • Flatlock and backward facing seams provide greater movement
  • Offset shoulder and side seams won’t get in your way
  • Gusseted underarms to keep you moving comfortably, all day long
  • Drop tail hem will keep you covered in any activity
  • Slim fit layers easily for any adventure
name: icebreaker Merino 260 Vertex LS Half Zip Herenga - Women's
